You will work in close collaboration with our Sales Department, as well as Marketing.We are looking for a proactive and curious person, with exceptional attention to detail.  Here\u2019s what you\u2019ll do: Assist our students via phone, email and chat, in regards to their questions, doubts and complaintsTake care of the relationship with our students and Franchises, assisting them on a life changing experienceStay up-to-date on our latest courses/experiences and the campaignsCover any questions and doubts about the services/experiences we provideOrganise your workflow, set yourself personal goals, schedule call-backsBe an ambassador for the EBS brand worldwide!Job requirements:Excellent communication skillsMinimum 1 year of Customer Service experience, B2B and B2C, in a similar working environmentFull working proficiency in English (C1) and at least in one other European language An understanding of EBS product or first-hand experience of an EBS courseExperience of Windows operating systems and CRM systems, including SalesforceStrong organisational and administrative skillsThe Offer:A competitive salary packagePaid travel all over the world A young, dynamic and international working environment, with 16+ different nationalitiesBe part of the small 5 person education team that control the education for the world\u2019s largest bartending school, this is a rare opportunity to make a huge positive impact on the industryRelaxed office environment including chill-out area, terrace and in-office music systemPing-Pong table and PlayStation 4Gym and fitness centre discountsCasual dress codeFree weekly Spanish/English classes for all levels*Company subsidised events and trips (in the past we\u2019ve gone to Rome, Berlin, Mallorca, Ibiza & Amsterdam) (*Temporarily on hold due to Covid-19 restrictions)About EBSEuropean Bartender School is the market leader in the bartending industry. Our mission is to educate exceptional bartenders from all over the world; making the world taste better, one cocktail at a time. With three global offices, more than 28 schools and a dedicated team of professionals, we have trained over 70,000 bartenders from across the globe over the last 22 years. A lot has happened in that time and we\u2019ve grown and improved a lot. Now, our aims are to expand our reach, epitomise the value of a skills-based education and be a driver of industry standards the world over. To do that, we need the right people, at all levels, who really understand our 'Hard Work, Spirit and Soul' motto. Bring your A-game and we'll bring ours; a youthful and dynamic workplace, great atmosphere and conditions, as well as growth opportunities for those who make positive, constructive contributions to our development."}
